block.p: The Bahamas Ministry of Tourism said yesterday that it had awarded the agency units of Bozell, Jacobs, Kenyon & Eckhardt a three-year contract to handle an integrated marketing communications program with total billings during the three years estimated at $90 million.

The New York office of Bozell Worldwide, the company's advertising agency, will handle the advertising portion of the account, which had been at the Joey Reiman Agency in Atlanta since July 1993. Three other units in New York were named to handle other duties: Robinson Lake Sawyer Miller, strategic communications, and Bozell Public Relations and CSS, event marketing.

Eugene F. Bartley Jr., president of the New York operations of Bozell Worldwide, said there was no formal review; Bozell Worldwide was a finalist two years ago in a previous review for the advertising portion of the account. THE MEDIA BUSINESS: ADVERTISING -- ADDENDA
